discover_us: Explore the hidden details of history with our self-guided tours.
sailor_desc: The perspective of a sailor arriving at port after a long voyage.
sailor_info: With detailed histories of the paintings and objects
tours_desc: Explore transmitted personal experiences at your own pace. These offerings are merely suggestions and additional context.
welcome: Explore the history of the Port of Hamburg
worker_desc: The impressions and tasks of a worker when a ship arrives.
